author: jerenkrantz
msg: (Someone with a good transform setup needs to run the transforms.)

author: brianp
msg: Start with a larger buffer size in ap_rgetline_core() to avoid
having to grow the buffer so often

author: brianp
msg: Optimization: modified the power-of-two allocator in ap_rgetline_core()
so that it converges on the new buffer size in a single iteration.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Stop trying to help apr and apr-util by installing their includes.  They're
smart enough to do so on their own.

author: rbowen
msg: The suexec arguments now start with --with.
Note that there are also two arguments missing, according to ./configure
can add those in, if desired, but if someone more familiar with it could
do so, perhaps it would be a little more descriptive.
